verses.verse: וְ֠נַעֲמָן <S%H5283><s%> Now Naaman שַׂר־ <S%H8269><s%> captain צְבָ֨א <S%H6635><s%> of the host מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> of the king אֲרָ֜ם <S%H758><s%> of Syria הָיָ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> become אִישׁ֩ <S%H376><s%> man גָּד֨וֹל <S%H1419><s%> was a great לִפְנֵ֤י <S%H6440><s%> with אֲדֹנָיו֙ <S%H113><s%> his master וּנְשֻׂ֣א <S%H5375><s%> and honourable פָנִ֔ים <S%H6440><s%> accept כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> because ב֛וֹ נָֽתַן־ <S%H5414><s%> had given יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> because by him the LORD תְּשׁוּעָ֖ה <S%H8668><s%> deliverance לַאֲרָ֑ם <S%H758><s%> unto Syria וְהָאִ֗ישׁ <S%H376><s%> man הָיָ֛ה <S%H1961><s%> become גִּבּ֥וֹר <S%H1368><s%> he was also a mighty חַ֖יִל <S%H2428><s%> in valour מְצֹרָֽע׃ <S%H6879><s%> [but he was] a leper

וַאֲרָם֙ <S%H758><s%> And the Syrians יָצְא֣וּ <S%H3318><s%> had gone out גְדוּדִ֔ים <S%H1416><s%> by companies וַיִּשְׁבּ֛וּ <S%H7617><s%> and had brought away captive מֵאֶ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> out of the land יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel נַעֲרָ֣ה <S%H5291><s%> maid קְטַנָּ֑ה <S%H6996><s%> a little וַתְּהִ֕י <S%H1961><s%> waited לִפְנֵ֖י <S%H6440><s%> and she waited on אֵ֥שֶׁת <S%H802><s%> wife נַעֲמָֽן׃ <S%H5283><s%> Naaman's

וַתֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <S%H559><s%> And she said אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to her גְּבִרְתָּ֔הּ <S%H1404><s%> unto her mistress אַחֲלֵ֣י <S%H305><s%> Would אֲדֹנִ֔י <S%H113><s%> God my lord לִפְנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> [were] with הַנָּבִ֖יא <S%H5030><s%> the prophet אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> who בְּשֹׁמְר֑וֹן <S%H8111><s%> that [is] in Samaria אָ֛ז <S%H227><s%> for יֶאֱסֹ֥ף <S%H622><s%> he would recover אֹת֖וֹ <S%H853><s%> מִצָּרַעְתּֽוֹ׃ <S%H6883><s%> him of his leprosy

וַיָּבֹ֕א <S%H935><s%> And [one] went in וַיַּגֵּ֥ד <S%H5046><s%> and told לַאדֹנָ֖יו <S%H113><s%> his lord לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> saying כָּזֹ֤את <S%H2063><s%> likewise וְכָזֹאת֙ <S%H2063><s%> likewise דִּבְּרָ֣ה <S%H1696><s%> Thus and thus said הַֽנַּעֲרָ֔ה <S%H5291><s%> the maid אֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> who מֵאֶ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> that [is] of the land יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> And the king אֲרָם֙ <S%H758><s%> of Syria לֶךְ־ <S%H1980><s%> Go בֹּ֔א <S%H935><s%> go וְאֶשְׁלְחָ֥ה <S%H7971><s%> and I will send סֵ֖פֶר <S%H5612><s%> a letter אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> unto the king יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וַיֵּלֶךְ֩ <S%H1980><s%> departed וַיִּקַּ֨ח <S%H3947><s%> and took בְּיָד֜וֹ <S%H3027><s%> with him עֶ֣שֶׂר <S%H6235><s%> ten כִּכְּרֵי־ <S%H3603><s%> talents כֶ֗סֶף <S%H3701><s%> of silver וְשֵׁ֤שֶׁת <S%H8337><s%> and six אֲלָפִים֙ <S%H505><s%> thousand זָהָ֔ב <S%H2091><s%> [pieces] of gold וְעֶ֖שֶׂר <S%H6235><s%> and ten חֲלִיפ֥וֹת <S%H2487><s%> changes בְּגָדִֽים׃ <S%H899><s%> of raiment

וַיָּבֵ֣א <S%H935><s%> And he brought הַסֵּ֔פֶר <S%H5612><s%> the letter אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מֶ֥לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> to the king יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> saying וְעַתָּ֗ה <S%H6258><s%> and now כְּב֨וֹא <S%H935><s%> is come הַסֵּ֤פֶר <S%H5612><s%> Now when this letter הַזֶּה֙ <S%H2088><s%> this אֵלֶ֔יךָ <S%H413><s%> to you הִנֵּ֨ה <S%H2009><s%> behold שָׁלַ֤חְתִּי <S%H7971><s%> unto thee behold I have [therewith] sent אֵלֶ֙יךָ֙ <S%H413><s%> about אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> נַעֲמָ֣ן <S%H5283><s%> Naaman עַבְדִּ֔י <S%H5650><s%> my servant וַאֲסַפְתּ֖וֹ <S%H622><s%> to thee that thou mayest recover מִצָּרַעְתּֽוֹ׃ <S%H6883><s%> him of his leprosy

וַיְהִ֡י <S%H1961><s%> become כִּקְרֹא֩ <S%H7121><s%> had read מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> And it came to pass when the king יִשְׂרָאֵ֨ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַסֵּ֜פֶר <S%H5612><s%> the letter וַיִּקְרַ֣ע <S%H7167><s%> that he rent בְּגָדָ֗יו <S%H899><s%> his clothes וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <S%H559><s%> and said הַאֱלֹהִ֥ים <S%H430><s%> [Am] I God אָ֙נִי֙ <S%H589><s%> I לְהָמִ֣ית <S%H4191><s%> to kill וּֽלְהַחֲי֔וֹת <S%H2421><s%> and to make alive כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> how זֶה֙ <S%H2088><s%> that this man שֹׁלֵ֣חַ <S%H7971><s%> doth send אֵלַ֔י <S%H413><s%> to לֶאֱסֹ֥ף <S%H622><s%> unto me to recover אִ֖ישׁ <S%H376><s%> a man מִצָּֽרַעְתּ֑וֹ <S%H6883><s%> leprosy כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> how אַךְ־ <S%H389><s%> also דְּעֽוּ־ <S%H3045><s%> consider נָא֙ <S%H4994><s%> now וּרְא֔וּ <S%H7200><s%> I pray you and see כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> how מִתְאַנֶּ֥ה <S%H579><s%> how he seeketh a quarrel ה֖וּא <S%H1931><s%> he לִֽי׃

וַיְהִ֞י <S%H1961><s%> happened כִּשְׁמֹ֣עַ ׀ <S%H8085><s%> had heard אֱלִישָׁ֣ע <S%H477><s%> And it was [so] when Elisha אִישׁ־ <S%H376><s%> the man הָאֱלֹהִ֗ים <S%H430><s%> of God כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for קָרַ֤ע <S%H7167><s%> had rent מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> that the king יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בְּגָדָ֔יו <S%H899><s%> his clothes וַיִּשְׁלַח֙ <S%H7971><s%> that he sent אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַמֶּ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> to the king לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> saying לָ֥מָּה <S%H4100><s%> Why קָרַ֖עְתָּ <S%H7167><s%> Wherefore hast thou rent בְּגָדֶ֑יךָ <S%H899><s%> his clothes יָבֹֽא־ <S%H935><s%> come נָ֣א <S%H4994><s%> I beseech thee אֵלַ֔י <S%H413><s%> to me וְיֵדַ֕ע <S%H3045><s%> now to me and he shall know כִּ֛י <S%H3588><s%> that יֵ֥שׁ <S%H3426><s%> that there is נָבִ֖יא <S%H5030><s%> a prophet בְּיִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> in Israel

וַיָּבֹ֥א <S%H935><s%> came נַעֲמָ֖ן <S%H5283><s%> So Naaman [בְּסוּסֹו כ] (בְּסוּסָ֣יו <S%H5483><s%> crane ק) וּבְרִכְבּ֑וֹ <S%H7393><s%> and with his chariot וַיַּעֲמֹ֥ד <S%H5975><s%> and stood פֶּֽתַח־ <S%H6607><s%> at the door הַבַּ֖יִת <S%H1004><s%> of the house לֶאֱלִישָֽׁע׃ <S%H477><s%> of Elisha

וַיִּשְׁלַ֥ח <S%H7971><s%> sent אֵלָ֛יו <S%H413><s%> about אֱלִישָׁ֖ע <S%H477><s%> And Elisha מַלְאָ֣ךְ <S%H4397><s%> a messenger לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> unto him saying הָל֗וֹךְ <S%H1980><s%> Go וְרָחַצְתָּ֤ <S%H7364><s%> and wash שֶֽׁבַע־ <S%H7651><s%> seven פְּעָמִים֙ <S%H6471><s%> times בַּיַּרְדֵּ֔ן <S%H3383><s%> in Jordan וְיָשֹׁ֧ב <S%H7725><s%> shall come again בְּשָׂרְךָ֛ <S%H1320><s%> and thy flesh לְךָ֖ וּטְהָֽר׃ <S%H2891><s%> to thee and thou shalt be clean

וַיִּקְצֹ֥ף <S%H7107><s%> was wroth נַעֲמָ֖ן <S%H5283><s%> But Naaman וַיֵּלַ֑ךְ <S%H1980><s%> and went וַיֹּאמֶר֩ <S%H559><s%> and said הִנֵּ֨ה <S%H2009><s%> Behold אָמַ֜רְתִּי <S%H559><s%> Behold I thought אֵלַ֣י ׀ <S%H413><s%> over יֵצֵ֣א <S%H3318><s%> He will surely יָצ֗וֹא <S%H3318><s%> come out וְעָמַד֙ <S%H5975><s%> to me and stand וְקָרָא֙ <S%H7121><s%> and call בְּשֵׁם־ <S%H8034><s%> on the name יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֱלֹהָ֔יו <S%H430><s%> his God וְהֵנִ֥יף <S%H5130><s%> and strike יָד֛וֹ <S%H3027><s%> his hand אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> over הַמָּק֖וֹם <S%H4725><s%> over the place וְאָסַ֥ף <S%H622><s%> and recover הַמְּצֹרָֽע׃ <S%H6879><s%> the leper

הֲלֹ֡א <S%H3808><s%> not טוֹב֩ <S%H2896><s%> better [אֲבָנָה כ] (אֲמָנָ֨ה <S%H71><s%> Abana ק) וּפַרְפַּ֜ר <S%H6554><s%> and Pharpar נַהֲר֣וֹת <S%H5104><s%> rivers דַּמֶּ֗שֶׂק <S%H1834><s%> of Damascus מִכֹּל֙ <S%H3605><s%> all מֵימֵ֣י <S%H4325><s%> than all the waters יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> Israel הֲלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> not אֶרְחַ֥ץ <S%H7364><s%> bathe בָּהֶ֖ם וְטָהָ֑רְתִּי <S%H2891><s%> in them and be clean וַיִּ֖פֶן <S%H6437><s%> ? So he turned וַיֵּ֥לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> and went בְּחֵמָֽה׃ <S%H2534><s%> in a rage

וַיִּגְּשׁ֣וּ <S%H5066><s%> came near עֲבָדָיו֮ <S%H5650><s%> And his servants וַיְדַבְּר֣וּ <S%H1696><s%> and spake אֵלָיו֒ <S%H413><s%> to him וַיֹּאמְר֗וּ <S%H559><s%> unto him and said אָבִי֙ <S%H1><s%> My father דָּבָ֣ר <S%H1697><s%> thing גָּד֗וֹל <S%H1419><s%> thee [do some] great הַנָּבִ֛יא <S%H5030><s%> [if] the prophet דִּבֶּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> had bid אֵלֶ֖יךָ <S%H413><s%> about הֲל֣וֹא <S%H3808><s%> not תַעֲשֶׂ֑ה <S%H6213><s%> wouldest thou not have done וְאַ֛ף <S%H637><s%> [it]? how much rather then כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> when אָמַ֥ר <S%H559><s%> when he saith אֵלֶ֖יךָ <S%H413><s%> to you רְחַ֥ץ <S%H7364><s%> to thee Wash וּטְהָֽר׃ <S%H2891><s%> and be clean

וַיֵּ֗רֶד <S%H3381><s%> Then went he down וַיִּטְבֹּ֤ל <S%H2881><s%> and dipped בַּיַּרְדֵּן֙ <S%H3383><s%> in Jordan שֶׁ֣בַע <S%H7651><s%> himself seven פְּעָמִ֔ים <S%H6471><s%> times כִּדְבַ֖ר <S%H1697><s%> according to the saying אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> of the man הָאֱלֹהִ֑ים <S%H430><s%> of God וַיָּ֣שָׁב <S%H7725><s%> came again בְּשָׂר֗וֹ <S%H1320><s%> and his flesh כִּבְשַׂ֛ר <S%H1320><s%> like unto the flesh נַ֥עַר <S%H5288><s%> child קָטֹ֖ן <S%H6996><s%> of a little וַיִּטְהָֽר׃ <S%H2891><s%> and he was clean

וַיָּשָׁב֩ <S%H7725><s%> And he returned אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to אִ֨ישׁ <S%H376><s%> to the man הָאֱלֹהִ֜ים <S%H430><s%> of God ה֣וּא <S%H1931><s%> he וְכָֽל־ <S%H3605><s%> all מַחֲנֵ֗הוּ <S%H4264><s%> he and all his company וַיָּבֹא֮ <S%H935><s%> and came וַיַּעֲמֹ֣ד <S%H5975><s%> and stood לְפָנָיו֒ <S%H6440><s%> before וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <S%H559><s%> him and he said הִנֵּה־ <S%H2009><s%> Behold נָ֤א <S%H4994><s%> now יָדַ֙עְתִּי֙ <S%H3045><s%> Behold now I know כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> that אֵ֤ין <S%H369><s%> there אֱלֹהִים֙ <S%H430><s%> that [there is] no God בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הָאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> in all the earth כִּ֖י <S%H3588><s%> for אִם־ <S%H518><s%> but בְּיִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> but in Israel וְעַתָּ֛ה <S%H6258><s%> now קַח־ <S%H3947><s%> now therefore I pray thee take נָ֥א <S%H4994><s%> please בְרָכָ֖ה <S%H1293><s%> a blessing מֵאֵ֥ת <S%H853><s%> עַבְדֶּֽךָ׃ <S%H5650><s%> of thy servant
